about_the_game:
This DLC added two new feature for the game:
- Custom music: allow you to add your external music file to play in the game
- Live wallpaper: allow you to set your room as dynamic desktop wallpaper
detailed_description:
This DLC added two new feature for the game:
- Custom music: allow you to add your external music file to play in the game
- Live wallpaper: allow you to set your room as dynamic desktop wallpaper
name: Chill Corner - Live Wallpaper & Custom Music
